thread.section_title: Bloomandwild Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bloomandwild | www.bloomandwild.com | 5 of 115
thread.title: Carol Coombs

author: Carol Coombs
title: Carol Coombs
text:
Easy to order online, good offers and discounts too.
I have ordered a few bouquets now through Bloom & Wild and been fortunate enough to receive one myself from a friend. The flowers are delivered in a simple but classic box which looks stylish. Inside the flowers are beautifully wrapped in tissue paper and tied with gorgeous grey ribbon, complete with socks on all the flower heads for protection during transit.
Wouldnt hesitate to recommend.
